name: Adrian Fann
text: We had problems with soot coming out of our gas fireplace and wind and rain coming in. We purchased a fireplace insert from Atnip and it solved our problem. We were extremely pleased with the time they took to explain the many options and the computer image of how our existing mantle would look with the chosen insert. They took time to explain the remote in detail. I would definitely recommend them

resp.text: It was our pleasure to work with you. We are glad to hear you are completely satisfied. We strive to have happy customers. Please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: John Fishman
text: If I could give a"0" star I would. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! We have a gas fireplace installed by Atnip at least 10 yrs ago (before we bought house). In the yrs we've been here we had them out at least once every year and it still has never worked right. Since JANUARY (!) I've been trying to schedule a service appt with them. We finally were able to schedule something today and I took the day off for it. I did miss their call - my ringer was off. But they always text and their were no texts and they said they were AT THE DOOR ready to work but no one answered it. They NEVER knocked so they were lying! Then they argued with me NOT about the lying but about my ringer being off! Typical old school Huntsville Southern business that still works as if its the '70s and there's no one else to go to. They apparently don't care about the axioms: "The customer is always right."  or "Customer comes first."  I am just ashamed I tried to work with them for so long. . AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!! We

resp.text: Our policy is to ring the doorbell and knock on the door multiple times before we proceed to call or text the homeowner. Multiple attempts were made to contact the homeowner, but we eventually had to move to the next job as contact was never made.

name: James Dint
text: Excellent service! Atnip has been around the area for as long as I can remember and I can't recommend them more. Huge showroom with lots of options to look at. I believe their installers (both named Mike if I remember correctly) were very knowledgeable and did an excellent job of installing my gas fireplace. I will continue to use them!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business! We are very blessed to have Mike and his 25+ years with us.

name: Pat Ragan
text: Just had a new gas fireplace and mantel install last week. The workman ship was great. The workers were very professional in the work they did. They were very friendly and polite. I would definitely recommend  them for your fireplace and installation needs.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business! Hope you are still enjoying your fireplace!

name: M B
text: Mike was wonderful, very knowledgeable and a perfectionist, love our new fireplace would highly recommend atnip

resp.text: Thank you very much! We are very blessed to have Mike and for 25+ years. We hope you enjoy your new fireplace. Thank you for your business!

name: Sherry Sobul
text: Hired Atnip to fix two fireplaces. When they left they turned on.  Paid $180 for the service call. The next day when we tried to turn them on they did not turn on.   When we called we were told it was not their problem because they turned on when they left.

name: David Bland
text: Very helpful,

resp.text: Glad we could assist you.

name: Trent Martin
text: Wonderful folks that will go above and beyond to make sure you are happy!

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

text: We had problems with soot coming out of our gas fireplace and wind and rain coming in. We purchased a fireplace insert from Atnip and it solved our problem. We were extremely pleased with the time they took to explain the many options and the computer image of how our existing mantle would look with the chosen insert. They took time to explain the remote in detail. I would definitely recommend them

resp.text: It was our pleasure to work with you. We are glad to hear you are completely satisfied. We strive to have happy customers. Please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: David Bland
text: Very helpful,

resp.text: Glad we could assist you.

name: Trent Martin
text: Wonderful folks that will go above and beyond to make sure you are happy!

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

name: Bob Frick
text:
Totally SHOCKED !!
Took my tanks in to have refilled, which where filled two months earlier else where. Get to the back to fill the worker comes out we talk, then I’m told my tank is too old to fill, oh ok now he is checking the other tank. It’s is out of date too . Well of course I inquire about how to tell. Then he tells me how you can be harmed horribly by filling an out of date tank. Says I should be a new tank come with me I’ll show you some. Then tells me how the state test them by getting them to fill bad tanks and more Regulation talk. THEN HE SAYS I WOULD FILL THE TANKS IF I KNEW YOU .
WHAT I ASKED DID YOU SAY ? Did you say if you knew me you would fill them? He said yes.
WHAT IN THE WORLD IS GOING ON HERE?? I left THAT IS VERY DANGEROUS!!!! NEVER AGAIN WILL I USE THIS PLACE. TOTALLY UNSAFE SHOULD BE SHUT DOWN!!!
Fill out of date tanks if they know you.REALLY.

name: Rick Thompson
text:
1 star for being a bunch of time wasters. We were loyal customers for 3 years. We moved houses and asked for them to come out and fill our tank in the new house.

Monday-- Dispatch said they will put us in the system and will be onsite next day.
Tuesday-- No show. Called dispatch and they assured us we where in the "system" and will be out next day.
Wednesday -- No show. Called again and told us we were not in the "system". Scheduled us for next day.
Thursday -- No show. They told us once more that they will come tomorrow. After hearing that a 4th time we decided to cancel.

@ThompsonGas Whatever "system" you are using will undoubtedly lose more customers.  Be honest when building expectations. It would have been totally fine if you said "we'll be there on Friday." But instead I was told "tomorrow" each time. So I stayed home when I could have been in the office. Get your shjt together, be professionals,  and stop leading people on.

name: Ailee Hood
text: Very helpful customer service i.e. how to get an account and service set up, and yes they take care of you way out in the country!

resp.text: Thank you so much for sharing!

name: Barbara Evans
text: Good service. Caring people.

name: Sharon DeFee
text: Office personnel are so lacking they can't find your bill by name or address. Maybe I'll just change to ACME.

name: Aleem Gillani
text: They seem to be very knowledgable and friendly, but this is NOT a retail store.

name: Jeff Roquet
text: Jen and the team at The Plumbers LLC are fast, friendly, and won’t break the bank. I would recommend them to family, friends and anyone in need of anything plumbing related. 5 Stars isn’t high enough for this company!

name: Angela Cummings
text: Did a really good job! The issue was not apparant at first, but technician kept looking for the problem using a process of elimination. We would call again if needed.

name: Frank Mullinax
text: Do not use this plumber.  The owner does not stand behind his work.  I had him come out for a Master bath remodel to replace a tub valve and re-route/rough in plumbing to a walk in shower.  His plumber that came out to do the initial work did not turn the new valve to the bath tubs water on, and after tiling up the shower and trying to turn the bath water on, there was no water.  Had to go back in through the tile and found out the valve was never turned on/tested to the tub.  The rough-in work to the shower ended up being so poorly done, we are having to hire another plumber to come out and go in through the wall to fix the shoddy work that was done.  The plumber that came out to do this initial work was too concerned with having to leave early to officiate a soft ball game.  The worst thing about it is the owner is not standing behind his work and fixing himself. He has repeatedly blown me off and will not come back out.  I could also go in to how he threatened legal action if I didn't pay him for partial work before the job was completed, but that is another story.  If he is that concerned about needing money before a total job is completed, not a reputable plumber.  Beware

name: Katherine Surrett
text: Highly recommend The Plumbers! They have done two jobs for me in the last two months- fixed a leak with our toilet and installed a new water heater. They did a great job with both! Their customer service has been wonderful, everyone I’ve spoken with has been very helpful and respectful, and they came out quickly and did a quality job. I will definitely continue to use them!

name: Meredith Peters
text: Wow, best experience with a plumber in a long time! They were here the next day as a second opinion to fix a flange on a toilet seat. We had previously been quoted almost $1000 to fix this issue, but these guys did it for $225! They were professional, courteous, and fixed it well. Definitely would use again and will recommend to anyone from now on!

name: Heather Lofthus
text: Fast, affordable service! Jen got us on the schedule as soon as I called and the next day Ransom and Jared were out to fix our issue. Very knowledgeable and polite! Will be calling these guys for all future plumbing needs!

name: Family Savvy
text: I've used Mike Myers and his team~The Plumbers~for more than 5 years. They did all plumbing on a recent home renovation, and Mike did an excellent job installing a pedestal sink atop an antique piece with marble (photo below). Whenever I text Mike, he responds quickly (often same day) and has always been more than fair in his pricing. My #1 choice for all of my plumbing needs.

name: Tyler Disharoon
text: By the far the worst experience with a plumber. Came out and gave a quote and said he would return 2 days later and begin the work. Never showed. Called to follow up and he committed to coming that afternoon. Never showed.  Called again to get him to come out. Said he’d be there the next day. Now he won’t answer or return calls. If you would like someone to start a job and never finish and leave you with water running everywhere...call these folks and they will leave you ya hangin.

name: Kim Akridge
text: Came out on short notice. Fair price to replace hot water heater. Very professional. Definitely would recommend.

name: Daniel Dyson
text: Hands down the best experience I have ever had with a plumbing company or service company in general. Call these guys!

name: Major Tom
text: Great service at a fair price. Called Mike with a water leak in the wall at 7:00am. He had at truck at my house by 9:00. The tech was very knowledgeable and did a fantastic job. Will definitely use The Plumbers again if the need should arise

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review. Call us anytime with any problems and will be there as quick as possible. We look forward to serving you again.

name: Cindy Partlow
text: This is the second time that I have used The Plumbers LLC - great service both times. Mike is easy to work with. Very knowledgeable and professional. Good clean up after the work. Will use again.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your feedback Cindy. We appreciate your business and kind words and hope you are doing well.

name: Rachel Beasley
text: After $350 and several visits over the course of a week including removal of fixture and scoping the lines, our toilet issue was still not resolved and began leaking blue liquid from the tank onto the floor, causing a mess for us to clean up. Hate to muddy the 5 star reviews, but $350 for multiple interruptions (and messes) and zero fix to a seemingly straight forward issue isn’t ideal for our schedule nor budget.

resp.text: Im sorry to hear this mrs beasley, i am looking into the matter , since we ran the camera down the drain i will have video evidence of that, also of the final product when we finished the job. I have the file from jan 23 .

name: Lauriann Loveless
text: So we had 5 leaks we patched, kept leaking. Had enough, called the pros.  They were here less than 2 hours, all fixed and to be honest less expensive than our patch jobs .  Trever was awesome.  They were respectful and neat. We live on a farm and they were good around the horses and dogs.  Will never do another patch job. Highly recommend. Thanks guys.

resp.text: Thank you Lauriann. Your business is very important to us. We look forward to serving you again.

name: Erik Brown
text: Trevor and Brian came over and did a excellent job! Very friendly and hard working. Great job! I highly recommend them! Thanks!

name: Marie Adams
text: They were on time and did a great job.  I would use them again.

name: Daryl Russo
text: My office hired The Plumbers, LLC., to replace a gas water heater yesterday.  Today we all walked into the office and there was an obvious gas leak.  We called them back and opened all our doors to air out the fumes. When they arrived, they could smell it as well and found the leak.  A leak they told me was caused by their installers who did NOT check their work after moving the water heater into place.  With something as dangerous as natural gas, this level of incompetency is unacceptable.

name: Robin H
text: Prompt, VERY CLEAN, honest and conservative, priced very well, answers urgent issues day or night. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND them and have used them for more than 5 years for a wide variety of Services at my home and other properties. Mike is worth the wait even if he’s booked!  I trust him and his team. Very personable!

name: Dionne Lovett
text: Mike Myers first fixed my washing machine that was backing up when no one else could about 10 years ago.  I have used him since over the years for everything from toilets that wouldn't flush to leaky kitchen faucet to most recently a dangerous gas leak in my fireplace!  He is the best!  Prompt, courteous and reasonable.  I highly recommend!

name: Tam Kay
text: Very satisfied! Team of 2, came out today to install our hot water tank. They got the job done very quickly, no mess left behind, Affordable, no complications! I will definitely recommend them to everyone I know and contact them in the future!

name: Susie Shaffer
text: Great response time from Michael Myers’ team of 2 men. Same day service for kitchen and laundry room pipes backing up.  Pipes were unclogged in less than an hour, and as a bonus got some tips on how specific cleaners and chemicals  can actually add to the problem rather than eliminate and on how to do some easy preventive maintenance to keep the drains/pipes clear and cleaner in the future. Thanks for a job well done.  I’ll be calling on you all again as needed!!

name: Steven Scrimpshire
text:
I don't give 5 star reviews. Nobody's perfect. However, we had a serious grease clog in our drains from years of neglect from previous tenants of our house. These guys came and did an excellent, efficient and thorough job of making sure our problem was fixed completely. The price was very reasonable and Robert and Brian were very courteous and professional, keeping us informed as they worked.
I highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review!

name: R Boyd
text: Have used this company several times. Always on time, courteous and gets the job done. My husband was here the last time they came and they explained everything they were doing or had done to correct our problem. I would recommend these guys for any of your plumbing work.

name: Matt Hadaway
text: Had a leak on Saturday. Came out within the hour and had it fixed in two. Very prompt, efficient, clean, and friendly! Will use again!

resp.text: Thank you Matt. We look forward to serving you again!

name: Suzanne Blocker
text: Mike was responsive to my call. I had gotten his name from my son who had used him for a new hot water heater installation. He was pleased and I have been as well. I had a noisy pipe problem.  Mike did not stop until he resolved it   He also replaced a small behind the sink pump downstairs.  Trustworthy and dependable

name: Leigh Ann Gilbert
text: Excellent service! Very timely and professional and fair . I would recommend to everyone.

name: Holly Webb
text: WONDERFUL experience with The Plumbers LLC! Kevin King came out to fix our sink and he was FUNNY and VERY professional at the same time!!! Definetely will be calling back when needed!!!

name: Liliya Sims
text: Mike is a phenomenal, professional, and efficient plumber. He went above and beyond to ensure our new water heater is installed and working properly.

name: Robert Duff
text:
I have been using "The Plumbers" for over 10 years. Mike and his team are always quick to respond to whatever plumbing needs I may have.
Try them once and I guarantee you'll hold on to their number!

name: Indian Springs First Baptist Church
text:
We had a great experience with The Plumbers LLC and would highly recommend them to any company or residence.
JoAnne Marsch - ISFBC Building and Grounds Chairperson

resp.text: Thank you for your wonderful review!!

name: Deana Wells
text: Mike and his crew did a great job with the plumbing on our new bathroom renovation!

name: Eboni Austin
text: Great plumbers with excellent customer service!

name: Amber Lee
text: Excellent service and very friendly! They went above and beyond at my house!

name: Amberly Mitchell
text: Very prompt and professional! I highly recommending them and will be using them again!

name: bjt 2077
text: Why not open the lobby and allow a few amount of people to come in at a time who need to talk with someone or pay their bill the last time I was there I had wait in line at the drive-thru 15 minutes because the lady working the drive-thru was gossiping to the guy in front of me there has to be a better way to pay your bill without mailing it !

name: El Inmigrante Aventurero
text: excellent gas company.

name: Marilyn Whitton
text: Just moved into the area and the employees were very helpful getting my service setup. They were very friendly and made me feel welcomed to the community.

name: Justin Farmer
text: Great people and prices.

name: Sum1hugme
text: Good service, but that blonde lady is a biiiiiiiitch

name: Candy Reeves
text: Convenient night pay

name: allen Henry
text: good place to get fire place items

name: Jeff Nail
text: Great place to work cheapest natural gas prices around

name: Candy Higginbotham
text: Friendly and helpful

name: donnie collins
text: Gotta have gas .

name: Steven Hoff (Gigabyte)
text: They don't work Fridays. And charge a ridiculously large deposit. If I didn't have to I wouldn't use them.

name: Anita Eubank
text: Black Widow Chimney Sweeps came for an inspection and chimney sweep. They gave me an inspection and cleaned our chimney to having it looking like new. They were quick to come, the next day after I called, and did a thorough and wonder job in all areas. I was totally satisfied with their work. They stayed close to the estimate I was quoted and did a great job all within a couple of hours. They took great care to keep the inside of my home clean as well. Very satisfied with their work and would recommend them to anyone.

name: Jeff Cornelius
text: Had a great experience with Black Widow Chimney. They converted the fireplace from had to wood burning, added a natural gas starter, and repaired the chimney cover. They were courteous, quick to respond, and did a great job. I would definitely recommend them and use them again.

name: John Timson
text: Patrick and  Cameron were a pleasure to have in our home. The work was completed in good order and a the cost that I was told beforehand.  If  you have any fireplace issues call BLACK WIDDOW.

name: Andrea Lucas
text: I wish I had read these reviews before hiring Black Widow to do an inspection on our new home that had 3 fireplaces and we wanted to make sure they were 'wood' ready. After raving about the skill level of the mason that built these fireplaces in 1986 they still came up with several issues that had to be dealt with including cleaning, to the expense of OVER $5,000. We were appalled at the price because we do have some knowledge of masonry. Had someone else come out who said our fireplaces were good to go...did not even need cleaning as they did not appear to ever have been used for wood. I've never had a bid before that I thought was almost criminally high!

name: katherine tucker
text: They made our super old, used, and neglected fireplace like new!  👏🏼 💯

name: Felicia Scalzetti
text: I had an amazing experience with these gentlemen. They kept me informed at every step, were more than willing to explain what they were doing and why and did an absolutely wonderful job. Could not recommend them more highly.

name: Kelly Grimes
text: Worked with Cameron and his brother on several issues with my chimney. They worked very quickly, responded to my making an appointment on very short notice, and gave me lots of good advice. Will definitely use them again in the future. Thanks!

name: Kathy Turner
text: Watch out for this company  - I got a quote to do a chimney sweep and inspection from a competitor for $169 - a discounted price since it was August.  I mistakenly texted this company to reschedule my appointment (thinking I had called the other company).  Carmen knew I was not his customer and he took advantage of the situation.  After the inspection and cleaning was done - he would not accept the quoted price of his competitor and made me pay $249.  This was $80 more!!!!  I objected and reminded him it was "August" and I was given the $169 quote as a Summer discount.  He raised his voice at me and was completely unprofessional - to the point where I told him to leave.  Lastly, he had me make the check out to him personally, which raises some other questions.  I would not recommend this company!
